org.aludratest.service.file.impl
Class FileActionImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.aludratest.service.file.impl.FileActionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action, Condition, FileCondition, FileInteraction, FileVerification, Interaction, Verification
public class FileActionImpl
extends Object
implements FileInteraction, FileVerification, FileCondition

Implements all Action interfaces of the FileService in a single class: FileInteraction, FileVerification and FileCondition.

Author:
Volker Bergmann

Nested Class Summary
 class FileActionImpl.WaitForFirstMatchTask
          PolledTask that waits for the first occurrence of a file that matches the filter.

waitUntilExists

public void waitUntilExists(String elementType,
                            String filePath)
Polls the file system for a given file until it is found or a timeout is exceeded. Timeout and the maximum number of polls are retrieved from the FileServiceConfiguration.

Specified by:
waitUntilExists in interface FileInteraction
filePath - the path of the file for which to wait
Throws:
FunctionalFailure - if the file was not found within the timeout

waitUntilNotExists

public void waitUntilNotExists(String filePath)
Polls the file system for a given file until it has disappeared or a timeout is exceeded. Timeout and the maximum number of polls are retrieved from the FileServiceConfiguration.

Specified by:
waitUntilNotExists in interface FileInteraction
Parameters:
filePath - the path of the file for which to wait until absence
Throws:
FunctionalFailure - if the file was not found within the timeout

waitForFirstMatch

public String waitForFirstMatch(String parentPath,
                                FileFilter filter)
Polls the given directory until the filter finds a match or a timeout is exceeded. Timeout and the maximum number of polls are retrieved from the FileServiceConfiguration.

Specified by:
waitForFirstMatch in interface FileInteraction
Parameters:
parentPath - the path of the directory in which to search for the file
filter - a filter object that decides which file is to be accepted
Returns:
the file path of the first file that was accepted by the filter
Throws:
AutomationException - if the file was not found within the timeout
